an3.36:5.4: Taṃ kho pana te etaṃ → taṃ kho panetaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | pāpakammaṃ → pāpaṃ kammaṃ (bj)
an3.36:15.4: () → (so tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccati) (bj); (so tattha phenuddehakaṃ paccati) (sya-all)
an3.36:22.1: appamattā → te khoppattā (bj); te khemappattā (sya-all, km, pts1ed) | sukhino → sukhitā (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
